hotels.title: Five-Star Beachfront Luxury on Indonesia’s Flores Island near Komodo National Park
hotels.description: A perfectly balanced retreat welcomes you to the heart of Komodo National Park: AYANA Komodo Waecicu Beach. Create lasting memories in the lap of luxury with state of the art facilities and services while surrounded by unparalleled natural beauty from this renowned sanctuary on Indonesia's Flores Island. If you long to break away from everyday life, where your thoughts can roam free while kayaking to a private island or you can mingle with new friends on the bustling 250m-long private jetty, AYANA Komodo Waecicu Beach is just the spot. You can also pamper yourself with a luxurious massage at AYANA Spa, unwind with yoga on the Yoga Deck with views out to the ocean, or take a dip in the sparkling infinity pool. You’ll also have easy access to all the best activities on the island, with Komodo Dragon tours, hiking, and island-hopping cruises at your doorstep.
